title: Broken streetlight near Lake Road
description: The main streetlight near the bus stop has been out for a week.

title: Overflowing garbage on Road 21
description: Garbage has not been collected for 5 days.

title: Water leakage near school gate
description: Continuous water leakage is making the road muddy and slippery.

title: Illegal parking blocking the road
description: Cars are parking on both sides, blocking ambulances and fire trucks.

title: Damaged manhole cover
description: Open manhole poses a risk to pedestrians at night.

title: Tree fallen after storm
description: A large tree has blocked one lane after last night's storm.

title: Mosquito infestation in park
description: Park area has stagnant water; urgent cleaning is needed.

title: Street flooding after rain
description: Poor drainage causes flooding even with light rain.

title: Roadside shop blocking sidewalk
description: Vendors have occupied the footpath, making it difficult to walk.

title: Potholes damaging vehicles
description: Several deep potholes are causing accidents and tire damage.

title: Public toilet in poor condition
description: The public restroom near the bus terminal is dirty and lacks running water.

title: Broken bench at bus stop
description: One of the benches at the main bus stop is broken, making it difficult for elderly passengers to sit and wait comfortably.

title: Overflowing dustbins near park gate
description: The dustbins near the park entrance are overflowing with waste, spreading a foul smell and attracting stray dogs.
